original_title: Hoods Woods Cave Cooking 4 Messin' With Meat
overview: Join Karen Hood in another volume of Cave Cooking as she shows  you how to mess with your meat!! She’ll show you the basics of smoking, curing,  sausage-making, meat preservation and much more! Learn to make home-made Italian  sausage, how to make oven jerky from flank steak and how to make jerky from  ground meat that doesn’t need refrigeration after you prepare it! Follow Karen  as she shows the complete process of making home made Corned Beef and Pastrami!
title: Hoods Woods Cave Cooking 4 Messin' With Meat
